Name: Bobs Track Builder Pro
About the game: Bob's Track Builder Pro allows you to create tracks using simple mouse clicks to form the underlying track mesh ready to be imported into popular car racing games and raced on against your friends. It takes just minutes to create a track instead of the hundreds of hours in other packages. Features: Spline based editing to create the layout. Add 3d objects via a simple interface. Export to games with the click of a button. Complex ripple strips, tyre walls and trees can be added in seconds. Import laser scanned Point Cloud data for ultra-realistic tracks (read more). Supports: rFactor Richard Burns Rally Racer DirectX (for import into other 3d tools)
